dict.acceptation: 糖果；冰糖；〈美俚〉古柯碱，可卡因；巧克力；
（用糖煮过以）保存；使结晶为砂糖；
〈美俚〉（服饰）花哨的；甜言蜜语的；

sent.orig: Candy Group offers customers high quality and reliable products with most up-to-date technology and top design.
sent.trans: Candy集团的产品不断推陈出新，以尖端的技术和顶级的设计，为消费者提供优质可靠的产品和周全的服务。

sent.orig: You show and explain the machinery – do not wait for CANDY asking for it.
sent.trans: 你展示和解释机器，不要等CANDY来提问。

sent.orig: Candy had a beautiful dragonfly necklace.
sent.trans: CANDY带来的是美丽的蜻蜓项链。

sent.orig: Candy showed us a rabbit puppet made in the shape of a glove.
sent.trans: Candy带给我们兔子宝宝手偶。

sent.orig: The main products are toys candy pressed candy chocolate candy hard candy jellies and so on.
sent.trans: 主要产品有玩具糖果、压片糖、巧克力糖果，硬糖，果冻，等等。
